law.history: Repealed 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 45, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 12, effective March 29, 1956.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Chapter not to be construed to prohibit department from granting certificate authorizing operation of taxicabs from unincorporated community.
